Articles.Content: I don't know, just a simple drawing of little Jeberooney. Not something I'm proud of- ER, I MEAN, OF COURSE IT IS! IT HAS JEB IN IT! HEH! Heh!...... heh............... I'm sorry...

Nice Fanart man.

Thank you! I don't think it's much though.

Jeb: 'EY! DON'T SAY THAT ABOUT ME! GET BACK IN THE DUNGEON!!!

Me: OK I'M SORRY YOU'RE AMAZING AND BEAUTIFUL!!! T^T

Jeb: .. Awww.... thanks.. here, have a biscuit. ^^

Where am I going with this?
Looks very cool, but has 1 problem. Both eyes are the same size. Kerbals' left eyes are smaller than their right

Looks very cool, but has 1 problem. Both eyes are the same size. Kerbals' left eyes are smaller than their right

Yeah, but I do that in a different way. Instead of changing the eye size, his right pupil is smaller than his left pupil.
